name: Pledge Health
long_description: Our AI browser assistant automates insurance tasks like verifying benefits, submitting prior auths, checking claim statuses, and more across all payer portals, directly from the clinic's EHR. It does exactly what the admin team is doing today, just helps them do it 10x faster and as thoroughly as a seasoned teammate.
one_liner: AI RCM assistant that handles any insurance task on payer portals forâ€¦
